rooms.name: GregoryStreet
rooms.description: You are on Gregory, outside the SDRP. Here is a puzzle: Illinois Fighting ______

rooms.name: SDRPEntry
rooms.description: You are in the north entry of the SDRP. You can see the 57 North, and a hallway to the north. Here is a puzzle: What is the last name of the person the CS building is named after?

rooms.name: 57North
rooms.description: You are at the 57 North.  There is lots of junk food. Here is a puzzle: Where are you?

rooms.name: SDRPSouthHallway
rooms.description: You are in the south hallway.  You can see the dining center and the door towards the dorms. Here is a puzzle: What year was the very first model of the iPhone released?

rooms.name: DiningCenter
rooms.description: You are in the dining center.  There are lots of students and unlimited food. Here is a puzzle: What is our university commonly abbreviated as? (4 letters)

rooms.name: SDRPExit
rooms.description: You are in the SDRP Exit.  You can see Weston Hall and the SDRP. Here is a puzzle: Which company owns ‘Hotmail’, the Internet based e-mail system?

rooms.name: Sidewalk
rooms.description: You are on the sidewalk, you see Weston. What is 2+2?
